hooks.command: bash -c 'FILE="$1"; if [[ "$FILE" == *docs/requirements/* ]]; then echo "BLOCKED: Cannot modify requirement documents. They are read-only specifications." >&2; exit 1; fi' --

bash -c 'FILE="$1"; if [[ "$FILE" == *zap-rules.tsv* ]]; then echo "BLOCKED: zap-rules.tsv must remain empty. IGNORE rules suppress alerts before SARIF upload, preventing human review. Dismiss false positives individually via gh api — see zentropy-security-alerts skill." >&2; exit 1; fi' --
bash -c 'if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT" == *"git commit"* ]]; then echo "⚠️ WORKFLOW REMINDER: Did you run code-reviewer, security-reviewer, AND qa-reviewer subagents before this commit?" >&2; fi'
bash -c 'FILE="$1"; if [[ "$FILE" == *.py ]]; then cd backend 2>/dev/null && ruff check --fix "$FILE" 2>/dev/null && ruff format "$FILE" 2>/dev/null || true; fi' --
